1.  Get the starter template. If you're using Posit Cloud, skip this step and instead open the `whr-website` project. If you're using Codespaces, follow the instructions [here](https://posit-conf-2025.github.io/quarto-brand/materials/00-setup/#recommended-setup-options), but go to [this repo](https://github.com/posit-dev/quarto-brand-website-codespaces) instead.

2.  Open `index.qmd` and click Render/Preview.

3.  Edit `title` `index.qmd` YAML to better reflect the site and add a `subtitle`. Preview.

5. Add some text to `index.qmd` explaining the plot. Preview.
